statements: SELECT project_id, project_name, project_location FROM community_agroforestry_initiatives;
SELECT * FROM community_agroforestry_initiatives WHERE project_location = 'ABC Village';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM community_agroforestry_initiatives WHERE project_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description, project_start_date FROM community_agroforestry_initiatives WHERE project_location <> 'XYZ City';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM community_agroforestry_initiatives ORDER BY project_start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM community_agroforestry_initiatives;
SELECT * FROM community_agroforestry_initiatives WHERE project_start_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM community_agroforestry_initiatives ORDER BY project_location DESC;
SELECT project_description FROM community_agroforestry_initiatives WHERE project_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_start_date FROM community_agroforestry_initiatives WHERE project_location LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT * FROM community;
SELECT community_name, location FROM community ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT community_id, community_name FROM community WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM initiative WHERE total_volunteers > 50;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM initiative WHERE community_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM community WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT community_name, COUNT(*) AS total_initiatives FROM community c JOIN initiative i ON c.community_id = i.community_id GROUP BY c.community_name;
SELECT initiative_name, total_volunteers FROM initiative WHERE total_volunteers > 10 ORDER BY total_volunteers DESC;
SELECT c.community_name, i.initiative_name, i.start_date FROM community c JOIN initiative i ON c.community_id = i.community_id WHERE i.end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM initiative ORDER BY start_date ASC, total_volunteers DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM community;
SELECT name, location FROM community ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, start_date FROM initiative WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, planner FROM coordination WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT name, location FROM community WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM community WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, name FROM initiative WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.id, c.name, i.name AS initiative_name FROM community c JOIN initiative i ON c.id = i.community_id;
SELECT DISTINCT i.id, i.name, c.name AS community_name FROM initiative i JOIN community c ON i.community_id = c.id;

SELECT c.name AS community_name, i.name AS initiative_name, co.planner FROM community c JOIN initiative i ON c.id = i.community_id JOIN coordination co ON i.id = co.initiative_id WHERE co.status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM Community;
SELECT community_name, community_location FROM Community;
SELECT agro_name, agro_area FROM Agroforestry WHERE agro_area > 10;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM Planning WHERE plan_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT coord_email, coord_phone FROM Coordination WHERE coord_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Community;
SELECT community_name, community_location FROM Community ORDER BY community_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM Agroforestry WHERE agro_area > 100 ORDER BY agro_name ASC;
SELECT coord_email FROM Coordination WHERE coord_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT plan_name, LEFT(plan_description, 30) AS short_description FROM Planning WHERE LENGTH(plan_description) > 50 ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM community;
SELECT community_name, location FROM community ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT species_name, average_height FROM tree_species WHERE average_height > 10;
SELECT * FROM volunteer WHERE volunteer_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT v.volunteer_name, p.participation_date FROM volunteer v JOIN volunteer_participation p ON v.volunteer_id = p.volunteer_id ORDER BY p.participation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM community WHERE community_id = 1;
SELECT community_name, location FROM community ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT species_name, average_height FROM tree_species WHERE canopy_coverage > 0.5;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM volunteer WHERE volunteer_id = 2;

SELECT community.community_name, tree_species.species_name, tree_planting.planting_date FROM community JOIN tree_planting ON community.community_id = tree_planting.community_id JOIN tree_species ON tree_planting.species_id = tree_species.species_id;
